title: Comparative Genomic and Microenvironmental Profiles of Hereditary and Sporadic TNBC in Colombian Women.
abstract: Breast cancer (BC) is a heterogeneous disease, and triple-negative breast cancer (TNBC) is the most aggressive and immunogenic subtype. A significant proportion of TNBC cases are linked to hereditary cancer syndromes involving pathogenic germline variants, most commonly in
